name: Saucy Chicken
description:
Saucy Chicken has NO intention to be cooked in sauce today or ANY other day.

Else he gets electric fried and "Sauced"
It's all up to you
Tap to Jump!
Thats it... Simple right?

-Cute Cartoon graphics
-HARD... We mean really hard gameplay (Try not to fling your phone)
-Top the charts with Leaderboards and see where you rank worldwide .

Player Comments

"Insanely difficult yet strangely addictive"

"Still Can't believe how excited I was to score 1"

"Be ready to be super frustrated yet entertained"

"Possibly more difficult than Flappy Bird and just as addictive, I kept wanting to go just once more"
